title: jaya pANDuranga
sahitya:
jaya pANDuranga nA ninna manake bArene


anupallavi

  nA ninna manake bArane bandare I bhAvada baleyoLu silukuvena jaya pANDuranga


caraNam 1    keTTa kirAtana beTTadanta pApava suTTu vAlmIki muniyeniside
    caraNam 2    antya samayadalli ati bhraSTa ajAmiLake antakana bAdeya biDisideyo 
    caraNam 3    tande tAigaLanu toreda druvanige cendadinda mArgava tOrideyo
    caraNam 4    pankaja nAbhane kubujeya Donka tiddi shankeyillade avaLa kUDideyo
    caraNam 5    tottina magana maneya kuDide pAlanu savidu mattavage muktiya tOrideyo
    caraNam 6    aidu mandiya kUDa sarasavu draupadige aide lajjeya kAideyo
    caraNam 7    dInaranuddhariya purandara viTTala Enu kAraNa nanna maredeyo
